messages.content: Like most people, I think Britain needs change.
We need a new government with the energy, leadership and values to get the country back on its feet and get our economy moving.
Your vote can help change Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will increase the health service pension – and restore the link with earnings, and we will increase funding for the NHS every year.
We will improve discipline in schools by giving teachers more powers.
We will work with local councils to freeze Council Tax for two years.
We will change politics by cutting the number of MPs by 10%, reducing ministerial pay, and by stopping the 'jobs for life' culture in politics.

issues.economy: We will take immediate action to start cutting government waste, saving billions this year alone.
issues.education: We will work with local councils to freeze Council Tax for two years. We will improve discipline in schools by giving teachers more powers.
issues.governance: We will change politics by cutting the number of MPs by 10%, reducing ministerial pay, and by stopping the 'jobs for life' culture in politics.
issues.health: We will increase the health service pension – and restore the link with earnings, and we will increase funding for the NHS every year.
issues.immigration: We will cut immigration by putting an annual limit on non-EU economic migrants.

endorsements.endorsement: I hope you'll use your chance to help change Britain on 6th May.

images.caption: David Cameron speaking at an event.
